trans-unit.source: Abstract class that represents an object that can be used to navigate a tree of objects.
To instantiate a MarkupObject, see <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter.GetMarkupObjectFor%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> class.
When overridden in a derived class, assigns a root context for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer> classes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext> to assign a root context for.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the attributes associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the instance of the object represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref>.

The type of the object may not be equal to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A> if the instance represents a factory which creates instances of type <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject.ObjectType%2A>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref> instance.
ObjectType returns the type of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject>.
For example, an item representing a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> would return the equivalent of **typeof(System.Windows.Button)**.

When overridden in a derived class, gets the properties of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupObject"></xref> instance that should be written to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
